org.hps.analysis.dataquality

Class DQMDatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.analysis.dataquality.DQMDatabaseManager

  • public class DQMDatabaseManager
extends Object
    Manages the DQM database connection and access re-uses ConnectionParameters and TableMetaData classes from conditionsDB as they do exactly what we want here.
